sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Joseph Chukwu wuru ewu nso nso a ka ọ chinyere nwa ya uwe o ji mee NYSC n'afọ 37 gara aga.
Ọ gwara BBC Igbo ihe mere o ji chịnye nwa ya nwaanyị uwe ahụ, ma kwuo na ọ dị mkpa ilekọta ihe e tinyere mmadụ n'aka.
O kwuru sị "Ọ bụrụ na anyị bụ ndị Naịjiria na-elekọta ihe e nyere anyị n'aka ka ọ ghara imebi, Naịjiria ga na-aga n'ihu."
Chukwu kwukwara na e kwesịghị ka a kpachapụ ife ala nna anyị.
Gee ihe o kwuru n'uju:
'Onyeagha nwaanyị mere m akaje n'ihi na m kelere ogbo ya nwoke'
Ihe ndị mere e ji achọ ịkagbu atụmatụ NYSC
Nwaanyị achọghị iyi 'trouser' n'ogige anyị ya kwara laa - Onyeisi NYSC
Ụmụntoroọbịa
Ezinụlọ
